verbs.description: [ARG1: The law firm] [V: founded] [ARGM-TMP: over a decade ago] [ARG0: by the attorney taking on Donald Trump and his longtime fixer Michael Cohen on behalf of an adult film star] got socked with a $ 10 million judgment in an unrelated dispute with a former law colleague .
